retail.calculate_tool.calculate.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The calculation engine failed unexpectedly.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The calculation service is currently offline.
Error 408: Request timeout - The calculation request timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have the required permissions to use the calculation tool.
Error 422: Unprocessable Entity - The input for the calculation is invalid.

retail.cancel_pending_order_tool.cancel_.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to cancel the pending order.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The order management system is not responding.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to cancel the order timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to cancel this order.
Error 404: Not Found - The specified pending order could not be found.

retail.modify_pending_order_address_tool.message: Error 500: Internal server error - An unexpected error occurred while modifying the order address.
Error 503: Service unavailable - Could not connect to the order modification service.
Error 408: Request timeout - The address modification request timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to modify this order's address.
Error 422: Unprocessable Entity - The new address is invalid or the order is no longer pending.

retail.modify_pending_order_items_tool.m.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to modify items for the pending order.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The inventory system is currently unavailable.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to modify order items timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to change the items in this order.
Error 409: Conflict - One or more items are out of stock.

retail.modify_pending_order_payment_tool.message: Error 500: Internal server error - An error occurred while updating the payment method.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The payment gateway is not reachable.
Error 408: Request timeout - Timed out while modifying the payment information.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to change the payment method for this order.
Error 400: Bad Request - The provided payment details are invalid.

retail.exchange_delivered_order_items_to.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The item exchange process failed.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The returns and exchanges service is down.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to exchange items timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to exchange items for this order.
Error 422: Unprocessable Entity - The items are not eligible for exchange.

retail.return_delivered_order_items_tool.message: Error 500: Internal server error - An error occurred during the return process.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The return processing system is currently offline.
Error 408: Request timeout - The return request timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to return these items.
Error 400: Bad Request - The return window for these items has closed.

retail.modify_user_address_tool.modify_u.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to modify the user address.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The user profile service is not available.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to modify the user address timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to change this user's address.
Error 400: Bad Request - The new address is invalid.

retail.find_user_id_by_email_tool.find_u.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The user search could not be completed.
Error 503: Service unavailable - Could not connect to the user database.
Error 408: Request timeout - The user search request timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to search for users by email.
Error 404: Not Found - No user found with the specified email address.

retail.find_user_id_by_name_zip_tool.fin.message: Error 500: Internal server error - An error occurred while searching for the user.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The customer directory service is currently down.
Error 408: Request timeout - The search for the user timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to search for users.
Error 404: Not Found - No user found matching the provided name and zip code.

retail.get_order_details_tool.get_order_.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to retrieve order details.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The order history service is not responding.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request for order details timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to view these order details.
Error 404: Not Found - The requested order could not be found.

retail.get_product_details_tool.get_prod.message: Error 500: Internal server error - An unexpected error occurred while fetching product details.
Error 503: Service unavailable - Could not connect to the product catalog.
Error 408: Request timeout - The product details request timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to view product details.
Error 404: Not Found - The specified product does not exist.

retail.get_user_details_tool.get_user_de.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to get user details.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The user account service is currently down.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request for user details timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access this user's details.
Error 404: Not Found - The user with the specified ID was not found.

retail.list_all_product_types_tool.list_.message: Error 500: Internal server error - An error occurred while listing product types.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The product catalog service is not available.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to list product types timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to list all product types.
Error 429: Too many requests - You have exceeded the rate limit for this operation.

retail.think_tool.think.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The 'think' process encountered an unrecoverable error.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The thinking service is offline.
Error 408: Request timeout - The thinking process took too long to respond.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to initiate the 'think' process.
Error 400: Bad Request - The thinking prompt was invalid or malformed.

retail.transfer_to_human_agents_tool.tra.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The transfer to a human agent failed.
Error 503: Service unavailable - No human agents are currently available.
Error 408: Request timeout - The transfer request timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have the necessary permissions to transfer to a human agent.
Error 429: Too many requests - You have made too many transfer requests in a short period.
